bug.author: md-shabbir
bug.summary: Environment variable TF_CONFIG is not set in the job's pod for non distributed tfjob.
bug.description:
/kind bug In kubeflow 0.7, Env TF_CONFIG is not set in the job's pod for non distributed tfjobs. However in kubeflow 0.6, it was set for both distributed and non distributed tfjobs. I am not sure it is a kind of bug or it was done intentionally. Environment:
Kubeflow version: 0.7.0 kfctl version: v0.7.0 Kubernetes version: v1.15.3 OS: Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS (Bionic Beaver)

comments.comment: Issue Label Bot is not confident enough to auto-label this issue. See <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> for more details.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/johnugeorge>@johnugeorge</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/richardsliu>@richardsliu</denchmark-link> do you know if this was intentional?
Yes. It was merged recently See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/tf-operator/pull/1080>kubeflow/tf-operator#1080</denchmark-link>
Closing this as working as intended.
